item.title: Men's Bracketology: Houston tops No. 1 seeds in final preseason edition
item.description: Purdue, Florida and Duke round out the top line as tipoff to the 2025-26 season nears.

item.title: Women's Bracketology: Ranking of No. 1 seeds shifts in final preseason edition
item.description: A key injury to South Carolina and other developments in the final weeks to tipoff shift projections.

item.title: Kelce has season-best performance in win over Commanders
item.description: Travis Kelce's historic night led the way for the Chiefs.

item.title: Who is left to pitch? What will Ohtani do next? Here's what to expect in World Series Game 4
item.description: Who is left to pitch? What will Ohtani do next? Here's what to expect as L.A. and Toronto return for an encore.

item.title: Dodgers win WS classic on Freeman's HR in 18th
item.description: Freddie Freeman once again lifted the Dodgers with a walk-off home run in a World Series, this time in the 18th inning of Game 3 against the Blue Jays...
